summary: Provides a plot management system for DVC repositories, aggregating plot definitions, resolving data sources, computing differences between revisions, and rendering visual outputs through templating. Includes custom exceptions for invalid plot objects and metric type errors, along with utilities for path normalization, data loading, and image processing.
business_intent: Allow data scientists and engineers to generate, compare, and visualize metric plots across different versions of their machineâ€‘learning projects, enabling performance tracking and analysis over time.
